title: Stratify Patient Risk by Condition
description: An analyst wants to view the risk scores for all patients with asthma, broken down by risk level (low, medium, high).

tasks.expected_outcome: The system displays a list of all patients with an asthma diagnosis.

tasks.description: Group the patient list by their calculated risk score category.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system displays the patients in groups of low, medium, and high risk.

tasks.description: Drill down into the 'high-risk' group to see the individual patients who may need intervention.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analyst can view the specific patients who are most at risk, allowing for targeted outreach.
